item.title: Two Questions
item.dc:creator: @ImNoHacker ImNoHacker
item.description:
@ImNoHacker wrote:

If anyone has the original locations for GWD, can you please tell me them?
(i’ve googled it about a billion times, but google searches through key words. So i get stuff like “how to make a rsps or npc codes”.)

I just recently added a new training area in my server upon request. What i would like is to add an npc at home that ask’s if a player would like to tele there or not.
I could easily add a command that teles there, but thats not as interactive. Would seemingly get boring if everything had a command. Now I understand how to add an npc dialog

public void -NAME-() 
	{
		interfaceEffect = 3;
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendFrame126("", 2494);
		sendFrame126("-text", 2495);
		sendFrame126("-text-", 2496);
		sendFrame126("-text-", 2497);
		sendFrame126("", 2498);
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		sendFrame164(2492);
		flushOutStream();
	}
then

if (NpcDialogue == ###) {
				-NAME-();
			}
then

if(NPCID == NPC##){
		NpcDialogue = ###;
		NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

But, I am not sure however, to make it so when a person clicks on one of them, it takes them to a different interface.

Like
What it would kinda seem like it would be

if(frame(blahblah) == ####){
sendFrame blablabla
}

I mean obviously not that, but you get the point.

Answer would be great

Read full topic
